description: Define cell populations to produce a report on for population and percentage based measures, across a set of defined regions.

region.description: A region can be composed of multiple mutually exclusive regions.

label.description: A label for a region used when displaying it. This should be unique to each defined region.

meta.description: Properties of a region that are not needed for execution.

Description.description: A description of the region definition.

rules.description: Properties of a region definition that define its behavior.

mutually_exclusive_regions.description: Set of mutually exclusive regions that define the region.

population.description: Syntax sufficient for defining a population of cells.

label.description: A label for the population used when displaying it in the report. Should be unique for each population.

meta.description: Properties describing a population that do not affect what it defines.

rules.description: Properties of a cell population that define the population.

mutually_exclusive_phenotypes.description: Set of mutually exclusive phenotypes that define the population.  If nothing is set, assume it can be any phenotype. This filter is applied first.

threshold_strategies.description: Keyed by marker abbreviation that have been analyzed for being positive or negative. If a thresholded marker is not declared here, do not filter the population based on it. This filter is applied second, after mutual exclusive phenotypes.

items.description: The positive or negative status of the filter

marker_name.description: This is the same marker_name as defined in the panel stains.

percentage.description: A measure of percentage defined by a denominator population, and a numerator population that is a proper subset of the denominator.

label.description: A unique label for the Percentage population used in the report. It should be unique to each percentage measurement.

report_name.title: Report Name
report_name.description: Name to identify this report setup

population_densities.title: Population Density
population_densities.description: The set of rules defining population densities to extract.

population_name.title: Population Name
population_name.description: Label to give this cell population in the report.

mutually_exclusive_phenotypes.title: Mutually Exclusive Phenotypes
mutually_exclusive_phenotypes.description: Comma separated list of phenotype names

binary_phenotypes.title: Binary Phenotypes
binary_phenotypes.description: Comma separated list of phenotype names with a trailing positive or negative sign to define the filter.

population_percentages.title: Population Percentages
population_percentages.description: The set of rules defining population percentages to extract.

population_name.title: Population Name
population_name.description: Label to give this cell population in the report.

numerator_mutually_exclusive_phenotypes.title: Numerator Mutually Exclusive Phenotypes
numerator_mutually_exclusive_phenotypes.description: Comma separated list of mutually exclusive phenotypes in the numerator.

numerator_binary_phenotypes.title: Numerator Binary Phenotypes
numerator_binary_phenotypes.description: Comma separated list of phenotype names in the numerator with a trailing positive or negative sign to define the filter.

denominator_mutually_exclusive_phenotype.title: Denominator Mutually Exclusive Phenotypes
denominator_mutually_exclusive_phenotype.description: Comma separated list of mutually exclusive phenotypes in the numerator.

denominator_binary_phenotypes.title: Denominator Binary Phenotypes
denominator_binary_phenotypes.description: Comma separated list of phenotype names in the numerator with a trailing positive or negative sign to define the filter.
